# rabbitMQ安装

# docker-compose 启动 ：docker-compose -f rabbitmq-docker.yml up -d

version: "3.7"
services:
  rabbitmq-1:
    hostname: rabbitmq-host-1
    image: rabbitmq:3.8.9-management
    container_name: rabbitmq-1-container
    ports:
      - "5672:5672"
      - "15672:15672"
    volumes:
      - /data/log:/var/log/rabbitmq/log
    environment:
      - RABBITMQ_DEFAULT_VHOST=/
      - RABBITMQ_DEFAULT_USER=mqz
      - RABBITMQ_DEFAULT_PASS=mqz
    restart: on-failure
    privileged: true

# 安装包安装

    1. rabbitmq基于erlang语言，所以需要先下载erlang 注意rabbitmq和erlang的对应关系，官方图：
    1. wget下载 erlang 安装包 (可以官网下载 https://www.erlang.org/downloads、git下载 https://github.com/erlang/otp/releases) wget https://erlang.org/download/otp_src_25.0.tar.gz
    1. 解压 erlang 安装包 tar -xvzf otp_src_25.3.tar.gz
    1. 安装 erlang 的依赖工具 yum -y install make gcc gcc-c++ kernel-devel m4 ncurses-devel openssl-devel unixODBC-devel
    1. 配置环境 ./configure --prefix=/usr/local/erlang --without-javac
    1. 安装、编译 make && make install
    1. 验证安装是否成功 ./bin/erl

  • 接着命令台输出： io:format("hello world~n", []).

  • 配置erlang环境变量 vim /etc/profile 追加 ERL_HOME=/usr/local/erlang PATH=$ERL_HOME/bin:$PATH export ERL_HOME PATH source /etc/profile让配置文件生效

    1. 下载rabbitmq的rpm安装包 （https://github.com/rabbitmq/rabbitmq-server/releases/） wget https://www.rabbitmq.com/releases/rabbitmq-server/v3.10.1/rabbitmq-server-3.10.1-1.el8.noarch.rpm

  • 9.安装rpm rpm --import https://www.rabbitmq.com/rabbitmq-release-signing-key.asc

    1. 执行 yum install yum install rabbitmq-server-3.10.1-1.el8.noarch.rpm
    1. 开启web管理插件 rabbitmq-plugins enable rabbitmq_management
    1. 设置开机启动 chkconfig rabbitmq-server on

  • 11 启动服务 service rabbitmq-server start

  • 12查看服务状态 service rabbitmq-server status

  • 13 初始默认用户为guest，并且指容许从 localhost 访问 ： “guest” user can only connect via localhost

  • 创建用户并且赋予管理员最高权限 rabbitmqctl add_user root root rabbitmqctl set_user_tags root administrator rabbitmqctl set_permissions -p / root "." "." ".*"
